title: You can now bag cruises to the Grand Prix 2020 locations including event tickets
text:

If you're looking to tick a trip to the Formula 1 Grand Prix off the bucket list, then you may want to check out Mirror Cruise's latest offerings.

That's because the cruise deals website has unveiled a host of packages to Grand Prix 2020 destinations - and they include tickets to the big events themselves.

The best part is that there are heaps of Grand Prix hotspots on offer whether you're thinking short-haul destinations like Monte Carlo and Barcelona, or thinking of going further afield to destinations like Abu Dhabi, Singapore, Melbourne and Shanghai.

Prices start from £749pp which includes your return flights, tickets to the Formula 1 event, the cruise holiday and in some cases, a FREE handpicked hotel stay at one of the destinations.

You can already book the deals on the Mirror Cruise website but it's worth noting that the offers are subject to availability so if you spot the perfect deal for you, you may want to snap it up.

There are various cruise lines included in the deals too such as MSC , Norwegian Cruise Line , Costa and Celebrity Cruises .

There are some pretty glamorous itineraries on offer whether you're thinking of a trip in early 2020 or looking to book ahead further in the year.

For example, sailings including the Barcelona Grand Prix feature ports of call such as Marseille, Savona, Dubrovnik, Rome and plenty of Mediterranean hotspots, with prices from £749pp for six-night sailings.

Meanwhile, Australian Grand Prix packages include cruises with itineraries boasting the likes of Phuket, Colombo, Singapore, Goa, Mumbai and Dubai, with prices from £1,449pp.

Never been to a Formula 1 event before? Check out our review of what it's really like at the Monaco Grand Prix for a dose of travel inspiration.

All prices quoted correct at the time of writing but are subject to availability and change.
description: Mirror Cruise has cruise holidays including tickets to the Formula Grand Prix 2020 races
